inclusion.criterion: Reside in geographic location near Split, Croatia
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Previous history of coronary artery disease
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Currently taking medication or herbal supplement for any heart or respiratory disease
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Women who are pregnant or trying to become pregnant
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Previous history of any condition that would prevent the subject from performing a breath hold
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Taking sildenafil or products similar to sildenafil
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Taking Nitrates or other nitric oxide donors
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of diastolic CHF, pulmonary hypertension thought secondary to a chronic ASD and COPD on home oxygen. They have been taking sildenafil in an inpatient trial without hypotension.
